title: What are your three top mains?
body:
Format: 
1. 
2.
3.

Personally, I like to use Fizz, Jayce, and Lucian.
1. Fizz {{champion:105}} 
2. Lucian {{champion:236}} 
3. Jayce {{champion:126}} 

All 3 being amazing characters imo

I usually jung/mid Fizz
Top/Jung with Jayce
Top/bot with Lucian

These are 3 mains I use and love.

replies.body: You must be blind, It says 3 champs
